meta.name: description
meta.content:
Inspiring students to learn; empowering students for life. Our teachers educate and support more than 50,000 students, pre-kindergarten through grade 12. Round Rock ISD serves Central Texas students in Round Rock, Austin, and parts of Cedar Park, Texas.
Round Rock ISD was founded in 1913.

meta.name: keywords
meta.content: round rock, education, schools, PreK, Kindergarten, K-12, academics, district, public, destination, teachers, classroom,

meta.name: description
meta.content: Inspiring students to learn; empowering students for life. Round Rock ISD teachers educate and support more than 50,000 students, pre-kindergarten through grade 12. Round Rock ISD is located in southern Williamson County and northwest Travis County and includes the City of Round Rock and portions of the City of Austin and the City of Cedar Park.

meta.content: Round Rock ISD, Round Rock ISD schools, public schools in Texas, award-winning schools, public school Round Rock, public school Austin, Best schools in Round Rock, Texas public schools, elementary schools, middle schools, high schools, K-12, high-performing schools, best academics, Coronavirus, COVID-19

div.p: Introducing News. A website dedicated to making it easier to search for and find Round Rock ISD news.

Round Rock ISD
Lillie Delgado Administration Building
1311 Round Rock Ave.
Round Rock, Texas 78681

p.strong: ROUND ROCK ISD ADOPTED A TAX RATE THAT WILL RAISE MORE TAXES FOR MAINTENANCE AND OPERATIONS THAN LAST YEARâS RATE.
THE TAX RATE WILL EFFECTIVELY BE RAISED BY 2.62 PERCENT AND WILL RAISE TAXES FOR MAINTENANCE AND OPERATIONS ON A $100,000 HOME BY APPROXIMATELY $26.58.

p.a: Learn more about the 2018-2019 tax rate, approved by the Board of Trustees on September 20, 2018.
